description.text: this message file contains message for [name] package

msg.text: Comp '$$s' on site I2C1 cannot be connected to the PMU, and thus I2C_WAKEUP_SLAVE cannot be ENABLED. Please use site I2C0.
Comp '$$s' on site I2C1 cannot be connected to the PMU, and thus I2C_WAKEUP_MASTER cannot be ENABLED. Please use site I2C0.
Comp '$$s' and '$$s' both have I2C_ID=0. Cannot assign multiple I2C comps with the same I2C_ID.
Comp '$$s' and '$$s' both have I2C_ID=1. Cannot assign multiple I2C comps with the same I2C_ID.
PMU.PMUCLK can only be driven by OSC.LFCLKOUT. Please check your netlist connections.
Based on the current design containing soft MIPI, Bank 1 and Bank 2 VCCIOs cannot be set to ($$sV) and ($$sV), respectively. Please check the output limitations for SLVS/MIPI for this device.
Based on the current design containing soft MIPI, Bank 1 and Bank 2 VCCIOs cannot be set to ($$sV) and ($$sV), respectively. Please check the output limitations for SLVS/MIPI for this device.
